p: A wide range of basic reproduction numbers (R 0) from 0.32 to 1.3, has been reported for MERS and are summarized in Fig. 6 [ 9, 14, 21, 72– 79]. Most researchers agree that MERS has a low potential to become a pandemic at this point in time, but once the CoV is introduced in a nosocomial setting, the R 0 can range from 2 to 6.7 and even from 7 to 19.3 [ 75, 78].
